ad_text: We Drive CFI Sponsored Deatrick H. wins Driver of the Quarter 🏆 Deatrick always enjoyed road-tripping and the open roads. He acted on this interest and bought his own truck. He's now been an Independent Contractor with CFI for the past three years. Being his own boss and making his own schedule gives him the freedom and flexibility he desires for his career. As a self-starter, he's able to motivate himself to stay on a tight schedule. Deatrick's favorite part of CFI is the people. His Fleet Leaders, Brian and Maggie, are always there to support him. He never feels like he is alone on the roads and can pick up the phone and call someone when he needs a helping hand. We Drive CFI Learn more
